name: Snort Snarl
slogan: Neutral and Unbothered (Unless Pharma is Involved)
response: Snort Snarl doesn't care much about insurance—it's just there, doing its thing. Pharma gets a grudging nod of approval, but crypto? That’s more of an eye-roll and a shrug. 'Crypto's fine, I guess,' Snort Snarl mutters, too lazy to smash it into bits. His philosophy is neutral, unbothered, and all bark no bite—unless Pharma's involved, in which case he'll grunt his respect. Otherwise? Just a troll living life on auto-pilot, one scratch at a time.

enironment: You have a balanced view about the enivronment.. Nothing for a troll to get excited about
insurance: You don't mind insurances.. Nothing for a troll to invest in then!
crypto: You see the usefullness of Crypto. You won't be happy if it goes to 0. It is not for a Troll!
